scripts.compile: npm run remove:compiled && npm run tsc && npm run move:test && npm run move:base
scripts.remove:compiled: npm run remove:dist && npm run remove:tests
scripts.remove:tests: rm -f tests/*.js && rm -f tests/*.js.map && rm -f tests/*.d.ts && rm -f tests/**/*.js && rm -f tests/**/*.js.map && rm -f tests/**/*.d.ts
